definition: sea and land/ocean and continent/army and navy
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
sea land air (transport, or military operations)

sentences.english: L2. Due to the destination is an inland city, we have to arrange sea-land intermodal transportation.
sentences.chinese: 由於目的地是內陸城市，我們只好安排海陸聯運。

sentences.english: The young man traveled by sea and land last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年這位年輕人經海陸兩路旅行。

sentences.english: It has come into the solid traffic layout across sea, land and air.
sentences.chinese: 轄區已形成海陸空立體交叉的交通格局。

sentences.english: Would you be able to get it there on time by a ground delivery?
sentences.chinese: 你們有沒有辦法用海陸運輸，將貨品準時送達？

sentences.english: Large-caliber naval guns have played a significant part in combined operations of navyand army in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 大口徑艦炮在海陸軍聯合作戰體系中有着重要的地位。

sentences.english: The effects of cumulus heating on the land and sea breezes are studied with the use of parameterization theory.
sentences.chinese: 本文用參數化方法研究積雲凝結加熱對海陸風的作用。

sentences.english: The people simply lean over the large rocks that separate the road from the water.
sentences.chinese: 人們只是斜倚在隔開海陸的大岩石上。

sentences.english: The army, navy and airforce are all controlled by the Ministry of Defence.
sentences.chinese: 海陸空三軍均由國防部管轄。

sentences.english: The coats of the admirals and generals were covered with gold braid.
sentences.chinese: 海陸軍的將軍們上衣上都飾有金色穗帶。

sentences.english: Datangpo Formation deposited in transitional facies during interglaciation.
sentences.chinese: 大塘坡組爲間冰期海陸過渡相沉積。

sentences.english: Guangzhou is South China sea and air transportation center.
sentences.chinese: 廣州是華南地區的海陸空交通中心。

sentences.english: Since there is no direct vessel， we have to arrange multimodal combined transport by rail and sea.
sentences.chinese: 由於沒有直達船隻，我們只好安排海陸聯運。

sentences.english: S. military is searching for the two by air, ground and in the water.
sentences.chinese: 美國軍方調用了海陸空三軍在搜尋那兩名失蹤士兵。

sentences.english: Mr Ouattara says he's ordered the closure of land, air and sea borders.
sentences.chinese: 瓦塔拉表示他已下令關閉海陸空邊境。

sentences.english: Our country is defended with strong army, navy and air force.
sentences.chinese: 我國有強大的海陸空軍保衛着。

definition: sea land air (transport, or military operations)
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
lit. to catch everything in the one net (idiom)/fig. to scoop up the whole lot/to capture them all in one go
Kagoshima, Japanese island prefecture off the south coast of Kyushu
to fish for (aquatic animals and plants)/to catch
Toucheng town in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
to encounter/to rendezvous/to converge/to meet (a payment)

Binhai (place name)/Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin/Binhai county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu/fictitious city Binhai in political satire/Primorsky, a territory in the far east of Russia
Hualong district of Puyang city 濮陽市|濮阳市[Pu2 yang2 shi4], Henan
